title: League not loading after champ select and a problem with the riot support page.
body: League gives me a black blank screen after champ select and I never get to the loading screen. I figured I would go and submit a ticket to riots support page but they keep asking me to verify my email but they never send the verification email. This all happened right after I bought a new skin and then I read that they have a problem with credit cards. I'm really annoyed that I can't even get help from riot on this issue and now worried that my credit card may be compromised. If a rioter sees this please respond I could use a hand and don't really now where else to go. Also I have redownloaded the game and used the repair tool in the client neither of which has worked to resolve the issue.

replies.body:
Pretty sure we can help with that!  I re-sent the verification e-mail just in case, so be on the lookout for that (make sure to chem spam folders!)

As to the issue you're seeing after champ select: are you hearing game sounds in the background with a black screen, or does the loading screen not pop up at all?  This will give us a better idea as to whether or not it's a connection issue or a software/hardware issue.

Since you mentioned it, also wanted to say that your credit card should be fine.  The error earlier in the day was from a back-end networking outage, not a security incident.  If you see any problems though, let us know of course!

Hey so I fIgured I would wait for the next patch to come out and now that it has I am still having this same problem. I really don't know whats going on and have tried all that I could think of to fix the problem.

Hey! Sorry for not getting back to you on this, I apparently missed the update notification :( 

In terms of the e-mail verification, I'd try using a different e-mail provider to see if there may be an issue with your e-mail.

As to the champ select issue, it's starting to sound more like a connection issue.  In the case of a black screen, it usually means that you're failing to connect to the game servers.  Best first step is to follow the steps in the [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which should help to rule out the most common causes of connection issues.  

Let me know if it fixes the problem or not!

Firstly thanks for the response. As for the champ select problem the entire game just fails to load no sound or anything also I do not get the failure to connect error message which usually pops up. Unfortunately I still did not receive the email in my main inbox or my spam folder.
